kubejs.ponder.blazunia_block_scene.text_: What if a Mana functional flower could power Blaze Burners?
Let's meet the Blaznia. It's a firey one!
Burn baby burn ... watch them burn!
kubejs.ponder.corrupt_mana_scene.text_1: Throw some mana blocks into the mix
Mana Condensers can also be placed over Mechanical Belts
If the inventory or belt is full, then the Mana Condensers will stop sending out blocks.
kubejs.ponder.mana_condenser_scene.text_: Providing rotational force to Mana Condensers produces Corrupt Inert Mana Blocks
Place Mana Condenser over any inventory with space to collect mana blocks
kubejs.ponder.mana_ducts_scene.text_1: You know how to set up the Agglomeration Plate
kubejs.ponder.mana_ducts_scene.text_3: Mana Ducts efficiently transfer Real Mana from Mana Generators to the Agglomeration Plate.
kubejs.ponder.mana_ducts_scene.text_4: The Omnibox was designed with Mana Ducts in mind.
kubejs.ponder.mana_ducts_scene.text_5: Place your Mana Generators around an Omnibox - shaft inward.
kubejs.ponder.mana_ducts_scene.text_6: Connect Fluid Pipes to the copper fitting on the Mana Generators.
kubejs.ponder.mana_ducts_scene.text_7: Add your Agglomeration Place on top of the Omnibox.
kubejs.ponder.mana_ducts_scene.text_8: And add Mana Ducts on top of the Mana Generators.
kubejs.ponder.mana_ducts_scene.text_9: You can now pump in some Pure Mana and start crafting!
kubejs.ponder.mana_generator_scene.text_: The Mana Generator converts liquid Pure Mana into Botania Real Mana.
Pipe in liquid Pure Mana into the Mana Generator.
Place a Mana Pool on top of the Mana Generator.
Provide rotational force (SU) to the Mana Generator.
The mana pool will slowly fill. You now have real mana!
kubejs.ponder.mana_motor_scene.header: Mana Motor, a motor that runs on Mana?
kubejs.ponder.mana_motor_scene.text_1: The mysterious Mana Motor is a puzzle, but somehow runs on Mana
kubejs.ponder.mana_motor_scene.text_2: Add a Spark over the Mana Motor - unfortunately sparks are shy and won't let us show them
kubejs.ponder.mana_motor_scene.text_3: And a Spark plus a Recessive Augment over the Mana Pool
kubejs.ponder.mana_motor_scene.text_4: The Mana Motor speed is controlled with your mouse wheel over the center of this panel
kubejs.ponder.mana_motor_scene.text_5: Using the scroll input on its side, the conveyed speed can be configured
kubejs.ponder.mana_purify_block_scene.te: Surround a Pure Daisy with Corrupt Mana Blocks . . .
and the Corrupt Mana Blocks become Pure!
But don't wait too long to mine them!
kubejs.ponder.omnibox_scene.text_1: The Omnibox has six synchronized input/output shafts.
kubejs.ponder.omnibox_scene.text_2: All opposing shafts rotate in the same direction.
kubejs.ponder.pure_mana_scene.text_1: Throw some mana blocks into the mix
kubejs.ponder.purify_liquid_mana_scene.t: Corrupted Mana Fluid is also purified via Pure Daisy
and the Corrupt Mana Blocks become Pure!
Filter the Smart Fluid Pipe for Pure Mana Fluid
When purified, the Pure Mana Fluid is pumped away
kubejs.ponder.terra_plate_scene.text_1: You know how to setup the Agglomeration Plate
kubejs.ponder.terra_plate_scene.text_3: Mana Ducts efficiently transfer Real Mana from Mana Generators to the Agglomeration Plate.
kubejs.ponder.terra_plate_scene.text_4: The Omnibox was designed with Mana Ducts in mind.
kubejs.ponder.terra_plate_scene.text_5: Place your Mana Generators around an Omnibox - shaft inward.
kubejs.ponder.terra_plate_scene.text_6: Connect Fluid Pipes to the copper fitting on the Mana Generators.
kubejs.ponder.terra_plate_scene.text_7: Add your Agglomeration Place on top of the Omnibox.
kubejs.ponder.terra_plate_scene.text_8: And Mana Ducts on top of the Mana Generators.
kubejs.ponder.terra_plate_scene.text_9: Now pump in some Pure Mana and start crafting!
creatania.ponder.tag.mana_machines.descr: Can we pull mana from thin air?
creatania.ponder.tag.cobblegen.descripti: Sticks and stones might break your bones
creatania.ponder.tag.mana_blocks.descrip: All sorts of fancy pretty blocks!
creatania.ponder.cobblegen_asurine.text_: Flowing Pure Mana will not be consumed
Molten Copper Source will be consumed
